tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MarketingMetrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    impressions INT,
    clicks INT,
    conversions INT,
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE MetricTrends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DecisionMaking (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_id INT,
    decision_description TEXT,
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_maker VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_metrics ( 
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
 metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
 value FLOAT NOT NULL, 
 date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
 )

CREATE TABLE marketing_channels ( 
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
 channel_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
 description TEXT 
 )

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns ( 
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
 campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
 start_date DATE NOT NULL, 
 end_date DATE NOT NULL, 
 budget MONEY NOT NULL 
 )

CREATE TABLE marketing_trends ( 
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
 trend_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
 trend_description TEXT NOT NULL, 
 start_date DATE NOT NULL, 
 end_date DATE NOT NULL 
 )

CREATE TABLE Reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name STRING,
 report_description STRING,
 report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Metrics (
 metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 metric_name STRING,
 metric_description STRING,
 metric_category STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Trends (
 trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trend_name STRING,
 trend_description STRING,
 trend_start_date DATE,
 trend_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DecisionMaking (
 decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 decision_name STRING,
 decision_description STRING,
 decision_date DATE,
 decision_impact STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Strategic (
 strategic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 strategic_name STRING,
 strategic_description STRING,
 strategic_goal STRING
)
